mapper.select: SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(T3.areaname) AS CHAR) AS fname,CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(T3.areaid) AS CHAR) AS fid FROM ( SELECT T2.* FROM ( SELECT @R AS _ID, ( SELECT @R := parentId FROM area WHERE areaid = _ID ) AS parentid, @L := @L + 1 AS LVL FROM ( SELECT @R := #{areaid}, @L := 0 ) VARS, area H WHERE @R <> 4744 ) T1 INNER JOIN area T2 ON T1._ID = T2.areaid ORDER BY T1.LVL DESC) T3
